Annual Meeting of Stockholders
The Company’s annual meeting of stockholders will be held on Wednesday, May 26, 2021 at the Company’s corporate offices located at:
2795 East Cottonwood Parkway, Suite 300
Salt Lake City, Utah 84121

Form 10-K Information
A copy of the Company’s Form 10-K, filed with the Securities Exchange Commission, will be furnished, free of charge on written request to:

Investor Relations
2795 East Cottonwood Parkway Suite 300
Salt Lake City, Utah 84121

A fully downloadable version of the Company’s annual report can also be found in the investor relations section of the Company’s web site at www.extraspace.com.
